title.value: Query for a location without returning associations

description.value: This operation is used to query for an location and will return the information for that location without following associations to other practitioner, organizations, or locations.

documentation.value: Search for locations with the specified name.
Search for locations with the specified city.
Search for locations with an address. Supports trailing wild card.

Search for locations within the specified health authority. See [this site](https://www2.gov.bc.ca /gov/content/data/geographic-data-services/land-use/administrative-boundaries/health-boundaries) for a list of accepteable strings.

Search for locations within the specified health service delivery area. See [this site](https://www2.gov.bc.ca /gov/content/data/geographic-data-services/land-use/administrative-boundaries/health-boundaries) for a list of accepteable strings.

Search for locations within the specified local health area. See [this site](https://www2.gov.bc.ca /gov/content/data/geographic-data-services/land-use/administrative-boundaries/health-boundaries) for a list of accepteable strings.

Search for locations within the specified local community health service area. See [this site](https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/geographic-data-services/land-use/administrative-boundaries/health-boundaries) for a list of accepteable strings.
